page.title: 14Farming D: Machinery
page.content:
As the farms in the area are of a similar type, their machinery needs tend to be the same, although much of the silage work is done by contractor. The following is a list of machinery in use on one of the larger farms. Mowing machine Hay turner, baler and bale grab Slurry scraper, slurry pump Farmyard manure spreader 'bin type' Fertiliser spinner Various chain harrows & disc harrows Diesel Tractors: 62hp, 45hp, & 35hp Combine harvester Three-furrow plough
There is a local plant-hire firm which offers 4 tipper lorries, 1 articulated low loader, 4-wheeled diggers, 2 track laying bulldozers and 2 track laying diggers.
